stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Lore of the Great Celestial River Rewritten by New Scrying!
stories.fantasy_story: Wizards gazing into scrying pools have unveiled new visions of the Great Celestial River's birth. It seems the different kinds of star-lights within it sprang from many grand cosmic shifts, not just one. Bursts of new light and whispering winds of creation shaped its ancient tale. Even pure stardust from afar played a part.

stories.original_summary: Scientists discovered a small protein region that determines whether plants reject or welcome nitrogen-fixing bacteria. stories.fantasy_headline: Druids Uncover Root Enchantment for Self-Nourishing Crops!
stories.fantasy_story: Elder Druids have found a tiny spark within plant roots that lets them welcome helpful earth sprites. By subtly changing this spark, they can transform a root's guarding charm into a welcoming kinship. Early success with sacred barley hints that all grains could someday feed themselves magically, needing no extra tilling.

stories.fantasy_headline: Rare Whispering Orbs Offered at Unseen Low Price for Winter Solstice!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Merchant Guilds announce a remarkable bargain! The famed Gnomish Whispering Orbs, which quiet the din of the world, are now offered at their lowest price ever. Many missed this rare chance during the Autumn Harvest Market, but fear not. This offer reappears just in time for the joyful Winter Solstice Feast.
